abrasedTextureCoverageFactor.Wiki: The amount of abrased texture to show on parts.

mainRustTextureCoverageFactor.Wiki: The amount of rust to show on metal parts (excluding trim details).

trimRustTextureCoverageFactor.Wiki: The amount of rust to show on trim detail metal parts.

abrasedTextureBrightnessFactor.Wiki: 0 is bright, higher values are darker

mainRustTextureBrightnessFactor.Wiki: 0 is bright, higher values are darker

trimRustTextureBrightnessFactor.Wiki: 0 is bright, higher values are darker

Self.Wiki:
Defines the Weathering options for Armored Cores.

Row ID links the Preset to the icon texture in SB_Weathering.dds and SB_Weathering.layout

Row ID + 210801 links the Preset to the FMG name it uses in the menu.
